jd: From: vivek, vyzeinc vkumar@vyzeinc.com Reply to: vkumar@vyzeinc.com Job Description -*Local candidates with government experience are strongly preferredFront End Developer (JAVA)Hybrid - Lansing, MichiganAny Visa F2f Interview JDMust be familiar with WCAG 2.1, ADA compliance and responsive design .
